about_the_game:
Show your love and support for Goblins of Elderstone with this special upgrade. This DLC is the special Grandhall alternate cosmetic, a unique visual upgrade that was originally pledged for by our amazing Kickstarter supporters. By purchasing this DLC, you show your unwavering support for Goblins of Elderstone and our studio's future projects and become one of our Stonekickers!

Please note, the Stonekicker Supporter's Upgrade is purely cosmetic and does not alter gameplay. It's designed for players who want to go the extra mile in supporting our development efforts. Your purchase helps us continue to bring you the best goblin-building experience possible. If you're a true fan who loves what we're doing and wants to give a little extra, this DLC is for you. Thank you for your incredible support!

short_description: Introducing the "Stonekicker Supporter's Upgrade" DLC! Featuring the Grandhall cosmetic from our Kickstarter campaign, this DLC is purely visual and doesn't change gameplay. Only for fans who want to show extra support for Goblins of Elderstone and our studio. Thank you for your incredible support!
